content: {"name": "Giant Supermarket, B'More Fresh Offer", "alternate_name": "", "description": "FOOD DISCOUNT: Partnership with the City of Baltimore, people who receive SNAP benefits can get up to $180 off produce. Participants receive $15 off select SNAP EBT fruit and vegetable participating products on pickup or delivery orders. Participants will need an account on Giantfood.com which requires their email address, physical address, and phone number. Must add $15 of select SNAP EBT fruit and vegetable participating products prior to checkout to receive offer. Limit 2 redemptions per household each calendar month. Order calculation excludes non-SNAP EBT qualifying products including alcohol, tobacco, gift cards, postage stamps and any other purchases prohibited by law. Offer not transferable or valid with any other offer. Standard delivery fees apply. Enter code GFBMOREFRESH1 at checkout while supplies last. Expires 10/13/23.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": null, "city": "", "state_province": "", "postal_code": "", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}}
